>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/roomtemplate/public"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the public settings for the room template with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["id"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"The room template ID.","format":"int32","example":9846},"public":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the room template is public or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The public settings of the room template to set.","title":"SetPublicDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
